movies.title: Crowsnest
movies.plot: This is a 'found-footage' movie from Canada about five young friends who go on a trip to a cabin back in 2011, but on the way (while filming it) they head off the beaten track to a place called Crowsnest where they have heard that you can buy beer for half price! They get the beer but at the same time they receive a warning to head back where they came from or they will die. But they don't take the warning too seriously and keep driving in to the forest. But they seem to be lost, then an RV hits one of them and all hell breaks loose. There's something about the people in the RV. Will the friends survive?
movies.simplePlot: In late summer of 2011, five young friends on a road trip went missing after being attacked by nomadic cannibals in a huge RV. Video was recorded by the victims & recovered by police as evidence in their still-unsolved murders.

biography.bio: Mittita Barber is known for her work on Crowsnest (2012), The Light at the End of the Road (2009) and Happy Face Killer (2014).
biography.name: Mittita Barber

biography.bio: Aslam Husain is known for his work on Crowsnest (2012), Big Time Movie (2012) and One Way or Another (2013).
biography.name: Aslam Husain

biography.bio: Victor Zinck Jr. is known for his work on Motive (2013), The 100 (2014) and Love on the Sidelines (2016).
biography.name: Victor Zinck Jr.

biography.bio: Chelsey Reist is an actress and writer, known for The 100 (2014), Crowsnest (2012) and Embrace of the Vampire (2013).
biography.name: Chelsey Reist

biography.bio: Christie Burke is an actress, known for The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2 (2012), Black Fly (2014) and A Single Shot (2013).
biography.name: Christie Burke

biography.bio: Olivia Steele Falconer is an actress, known for Red Riding Hood (2011), The Client List (2010) and Crowsnest (2012).
biography.name: Olivia Steele Falconer

biography.bio: C. Ernst Harth got his first taste of acting in grade school when the drama club cast the school's largest child to play Santa in their Christmas pageant. He was just in kindergarten at the time. Involved in community theatre and improvisational comedy during high school, it wasn't until he relocated to Vancouver in 1989 that he seriously pursued acting full-time. In 1990, he landed his first professional gig in a TV commercial for the BC Chicken Growers. Since then, Ernst has become a busy character actor known for dozens of roles, such as The Great Child in Thir13en Ghosts (2001), Miner 49er in Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed (2004), Lowell Lee Andrews in Capote (2005), Baby Boy Tremor in Smokin' Aces 2: Assassins' Ball (2010) and recently as Bonzo in Dead Rising: Watchtower (2015).
biography.name: C. Ernst Harth

biography.bio: Ian Carter is known for his work on Monster Trucks (2016), Crowsnest (2012) and The Christmas Ornament (2013).
biography.name: Ian Carter

biography.bio: John Sheppard is a writer and producer, known for MacGyver (1985), Mister Dynamite (1986) and Detention (2003). He has been married to Pamala Sheppard since August 30, 2003.
biography.name: John Sheppard
